mapper.insert: insert into base_city (id, code, name, spelling, short_spelling, name_en, state_id, state_code, country_code, created_date, modified_date, status, is_hot, geo_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spelling,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shortSpelling,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{isHot,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{geoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update base_city set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spelling = #{spelling,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, short_spelling = #{shortSpelling,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name_en = #{nameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state_id = #{stateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state_code = #{stateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country_code = #{countryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modified_date = #{modifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, is_hot = #{isHot,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, geo_id = #{geoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, code, name, spelling, short_spelling, name_en, state_id, state_code, country_code, created_date, modified_date, status, is_hot, geo_id from base_city where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
